text: import java.net.Â¥*; import java.io.*; public class SocketStore { public static void main(String[] args) { try { Socket socket = new Socket ("www.yahoo.com", 80); System.out.println("Successfully connected to yahoo"); System.out.println("Saving the Socket Address"); SocketAddress yahoo = socket.getRemoteSocketAddress() ; System.out.println("Closing the Socket"); socket.close() ; Socket socket2 = new Socket(); socket2.connect (yahoo) ; System.out.println("Again connected to yahoo using socket Address");} catch (IOException ex) { System.err.println(ex); ) ) ) CAADIL 2077 Matisrmel Demorr= v v e e
